longBusinessSummary.0: V.I.P. Industries Limited manufactures and sells luggage, bags, and accessories in India. It offers hard and soft luggage, including handbags, printed polycarbonate luggage products, soft uprights, vanity cases, hard suitcases, briefcases, trolleys, rucksacks, backpacks, duffel-bags, laptop bags, and school bags. The company provides its products primarily under the VIP, Caprese, Carlton, Skybags, Alfa, Footloose, and Aristocrat brands. It also exports its products to approximately 45 countries. V.I.P. Industries Limited was incorporated in 1968 and is based in Mumbai, India.
